XIII.i.3.H.2.b
.
Responsibility for Responding to Requests for Information Regarding CHAMPVA Eligibility
Veterans Service Centers are responsible for processing requests from HAC for information regarding CHAMPVA eligibility that involve a
living
Veteran’s dependent(s).  Pension management centers are responsible for processing requests involving a Veteran’s
survivor(s)
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section H - Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs (CHAMPVA) Eligibility Determinations
